mapper.select: select post_idx, reply_idx, replyer_id, p.member_name replyer_name, reply_content, regDate from reply_table r, panya_member_table p where post_idx = #{post_idx} and r.replyer_id = p.member_id
mapper.insert: insert into reply_table(reply_idx, post_idx, replyer_id, reply_content, regdate) values(reply_seq.nextval, #{post_idx}, #{replyer_id}, #{reply_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
